entry.title: It has occurred to me that it would be useful to a...
entry.summary: It has occurred to me that it would be useful to associate an email address with my delegation so that should my provider disappear or succumb to hackers I will be able to restore access to my id.
entry.content: It has occurred to me that it would be useful to associate an email address with my delegation so that should my provider disappear or succumb to hackers I will be able to restore access to my id.
